title: Atlas Reactor
notes: Launcher complains about requiring Vista or higher

title: Atlas Reactor
notes: After running game asked for newest Vista version

title: Atlas Reactor
notes: Launcher works perfectly, but it refuses to launch the game because it "requires at least Windows Vista to run".

Runs good but with low fps and rare random crashes after some tweak: you need to find the file "Library/GlyphLibrary.xml" inside the game folder and change the 'winvista' field to 'winxp' (you can change every occurrence of 'winvista' actually) , then deny any changes to this file by revoking the write permission for all.
title: Atlas Reactor
